tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE legislative_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bill_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  bill_number TEXT NOT NULL,
  status TEXT,
  date_introduced DATE,
  date_enacted DATE
)

CREATE TABLE bills (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    bill_number INT,
    bill_title VARCHAR(255),
    introduced_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE laws (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    law_number INT,
    law_title VARCHAR(255),
    enactment_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE bills (
    bill_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    bill_name STRING,
    bill_type STRING,
    bill_status STRING,
    introduced_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE laws (
    law_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    law_name STRING,
    law_description STRING,
    law_type STRING,
    enactment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE legislators (
    legislator_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    legislator_name STRING,
    legislator_party STRING,
    legislator_district STRING,
    legislator_email STRING
);

CREATE TABLE committees (
    committee_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    committee_name STRING,
    committee_type STRING,
    committee_chair STRING,
    members_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE bills (
    bill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bill_title TEXT,
    bill_description TEXT,
    sponsor_name TEXT,
    date_proposed DATE
);

CREATE TABLE votes (
    vote_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bill_id INT,
    legislator_id INT,
    vote_result TEXT,
    voting_date DATE
);
